problem_text_cn: 如图,某校数学兴趣小组利用自制的直角三角形硬纸板DEF来测量操场旗杆AB的高度,他们通过调整测量位置,使斜边DF与地面保持平行,并使边DE与旗杆顶点A在同一直线上,已知DE=0.5米,EF=0.25米,目测点D到地面的距离DG=1.5米,到旗杆的水平距离DC=20米,则旗杆的高度为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, a school's mathematical interest group used a homemade right triangle cardboard DEF to measure the height of the playground flagpole AB. They adjusted the measurement position to keep the hypotenuse DF parallel to the ground, and make the edge DE and the flagpole vertex A on the same straight line. It is known that DE = N_0, EF = N_1, the distance from the visual point D to the ground DG = N_2, the horizontal distance to the flagpole DC = N_3, then the height of the flagpole is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵∠FDE=∠ADC=30°,∠DEF=∠DCA=90°,∴△DEF∽△DAC,∴\frac{DE}{CD}=\frac{EF}{AC},即\frac{0.5}{20}=\frac{0.25}{AC},解得AC=10,∵DF与地面保持平行,目测点D到地面的距离DG=1.5米,∴BC=DG=1.5米,∴旗杆的高度=AC+BC=10+1.5=11.5米．故选:C．
raw_comment: 本题考查了相似三角形的应用,主要利用了相似三角形对应边成比例,准确确定出相似三角形是解题的关键．
